note:
Life is Meditation - Meditation is Life

Relax, nothing is under control, except your choices in each moment. Can you find peace and ease of being right now? Ease a bit from any tension or tightness you might be carrying around? Maybe smile a bit? :)

name: Sijainti (location)
value: Suomi Finland, Pohjantähden alla (below The Pole Star)

name: Ikä (age)
value: How many Wings or Factors of Enlightenment there are in the Buddha Dhamma? +1
